hero.title: Experience the Perfect Clean
hero.subtitle: Professional home and office cleaning services tailored to your needs. Validated, vetted, and trusted by thousands.

testimonials.name: Alice Johnson
testimonials.text: Absolutely amazing service. The team was professional and left my house sparkling clean!

testimonials.name: Mark Smith
testimonials.text: Great attention to detail. I've used many services before, but PristineClean is the best.

testimonials.name: Sarah Williams
testimonials.text: Very good service, arrived on time and did a solid job. Will book again.
